statements: SELECT * FROM refunds_and_returns;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, return_reason FROM refunds_and_returns;
SELECT customer_id, refund_amount FROM refunds_and_returns;
SELECT * FROM refunds_and_returns ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, refund_amount FROM refunds_and_returns WHERE refund_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM refunds_and_returns WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, refund_amount FROM refunds_and_returns WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, return_reason FROM refunds_and_returns ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(refund_amount) AS avg_refund FROM refunds_and_returns WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM refunds_and_returns WHERE return_reason LIKE '%defective%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM refunds WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT refund_id, customer_id, refund_amount FROM refunds WHERE refund_amount > 50.00 ORDER BY refund_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_refunds FROM refunds GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT refund_id, customer_id, refund_reason FROM refunds WHERE refund_reason LIKE '%defective%';
SELECT * FROM returns ORDER BY return_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM refunds WHERE refund_amount > 1000 ORDER BY refund_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, refund_amount FROM refunds WHERE refund_reason LIKE '%defective%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, refund_amount DESC;
SELECT refund_id, customer_id, transaction_id FROM refunds WHERE refund_reason IS NOT NULL AND refund_amount < 500 ORDER BY customer_id, transaction_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_refunds, SUM(refund_amount) AS total_refund_amount FROM refunds;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_returns FROM returns GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_returns > 2 ORDER BY total_returns DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT product_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM refunds WHERE refund_amount < 0
SELECT return_id, transaction_id, return_date FROM returns
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM refunds ORDER BY refund_date DESC, refund_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.customer_id, r.refund_amount FROM transactions t JOIN refunds r ON t.transaction_id = r.transaction_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY return_date;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_amount, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM refund_requests WHERE refund_status = 'approved' ORDER BY refund_date ASC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 5000
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM refund_requests WHERE refund_status = 'approved' ORDER BY refund_id DESC
SELECT return_id, return_reason FROM return_requests WHERE return_status = 'pending'
SELECT transaction_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING total_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date FROM transactions
SELECT product_name, price FROM products
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM transactions LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, transactions.amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transactions.status = 'completed'
SELECT products.product_name, products.price, refunds.amount FROM products JOIN refunds ON products.product_id = refunds.transaction_id WHERE refunds.amount > 500 ORDER BY refunds.amount DESC

SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, COUNT(transactions.transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM customers LEFT JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customers.customer_id HAVING transaction_count > 5

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transactions.transaction_date, refunds.refund_date FROM transactions LEFT JOIN refunds ON transactions.transaction_id = refunds.transaction_id WHERE refunds.refund_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY transactions.transaction_date
